title: Online Program Evaluation and Lifelong Learning Competency Development Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundations of educational program design, basic statistics, and science education methodologies
context.additional_context: A process for pre-service/in-service science teachers to acquire program evaluation competencies in a simulation environment and develop lifelong learning strategies through formative feedback.

learning_goals: Learners can apply various program evaluation methodologies (formative/summative assessment) in VR simulation environments.
In online discussion forums, learners can propose specific program improvement plans through peer evaluation.
Learners can establish a lifelong learning plan and set three or more actionable goals through reflective journaling.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
